name: Absolute Zero (itch) (Xyvyc)
description:
Developers: Unicorn Studios (Matthew Belen, John Karlo Mendoza, Renzo Romano, Benson Leong, Berlin Almanon)

This game was our output for the "Build for Unity" Game Jam which was hosted in iAcademy last January 2020 that won us the 3rd place in the event.
